subject: World Series
Television
lead_paragraph: This World Series looks as if it will beat the one in 2006 as the least-viewed ever. Viewership fell from Game 1 to Game 2, and the rain-delayed Game 3 was calamitous.
snippet: This World Series looks as if it will beat the one in 2006 as the least-viewed ever. Viewership fell from Game 1 to Game 2, and the rain-delayed Game 3 was calamitous.
